DOC.brief_summary: Although discography spinal imaging technique , either alone combination , commonly use diagnose discogenic pain , exact role predict surgical result poorly define . Our aim study compare ability Functional anesthetic discography ( FAD ) , Provocative Discography ( PD ) diagnose discogenic pain correctly identify disc level surgical treatment . Proper identification disc level improve overall result surgery condition . Patients discogenic pain good outcome disc level fusion surgery identify use FAD compare similar disc level identification PD .
DOC.brief_title: Value Functional Anesthetic Provocative Discography Surgical Treatment Discogenic Pain
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 21 65 year . 2 . Symptoms least 6 month duration . 3 . Primarily axial low back pain . 4 . At least 6 month conservative treatment , include , physical therapy , injection , chiropractic etc . 5 . Patients overall pain score great 6/10 ( NRS ) . 6 . Recent ( within past 6 month ) lumbar spine MRI showing : disc desiccation loss disc height least one disc level . 1 . History previous spine surgery . 2 . MRI change two disc level recent ( within past 6 month ) lumbar spine MRI . 3 . Clinical radiological evidence significant : 1 . Disc herniation 2 . Spinal Stenosis 3 . Spinal Deformity 4 . Spondylolisthesis 5 . Spinal instability parsdefect 6 . Facet Syndrome 7 . Sacroiliac Joint Dysfunction 8 . Myofascial Pain Syndrome 9 . Fibromyalgia 4 . Current issue : 1 . Litigation 2 . Disability 3 . Drug addiction substance abuse 4 . Chronic pain medication abuse 5 . Current diagnosis medication use unstable anxiety , depression , and/or behavioral disorder .
